title: Manipulating non-equilibrium diffusion-controlled reaction toward reversible alloying reactions in alkali ion batteries
content:

Alloying materials, recognized as promising candidates for graphite anodes, are extensively explored for their high energy density. However, the chronic challenges originating from volumetric expansion and the resultant stress leading...
